welcome_message_body: Welcome to Milpitas, a charming city known for its diverse culture and beautiful parks. Get ready to explore and enjoy all that this vibrant community has to offer!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Reid-Hillview Airport offers a variety of amenities for travelers, including a cafe, gift shop, and rental car services.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Palo Alto Airport, serving commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Livermore Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Livermore Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at HWD airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at HWD airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Metropolitan Oak International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Metropolitan Oak International Airport, primarily serving regional flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network by selecting 'OAK Free WiFi' and accepting the terms and conditions.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Half Moon Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Half Moon Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's WiFi network for free.
